message.name: CURRENT_DEPTH
message.description: Publish Current Depth in uuv application
message.field: Timestamp (UNIX Epoch time or time since system boot). The receiving end can infer timestamp format (since 1.1.1970 or since system boot) by checking for the magnitude of the number.

message.name: TETHER_INFO
message.description: Publish Current Depth in uuv application
